title: 'Unfinished business': The White House aides coming back for Trump 2.0
shortDescription: Donald Trump has rapidly assembled his next White House team, with several veterans from his first term planning to move aggressively on Day One.

title: Connecticut House Democrats receive Thanksgiving Day bomb threats
shortDescription: Multiple House Democrats from Connecticut including the chairman of the House Intelligence Committee were targets of Thanksgiving Day bomb threats Thursday.

title: Does Congress have to authorize tariffs? What to know
shortDescription: Congress usually sets tariffs, but President-elect Donald Trump could declare a national emergency, as he's done in the past.

title: Trump talks about 'effectively closing' the border with Mexican president
shortDescription: Mexico's president spoke with President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs in an effort to crack down on illegal immigration.

title: Trump cabinet picks receive bomb threats
shortDescription: Several members of President-elect Donald Trump's nominated cabinet members have been targeted with bomb threats, according to the FBI.

title: Trump AG pick didn't post about probing Pelosi finances | Fact check
shortDescription: There's no record of the post on Bondi's X profile. The post was shared by a satirical X account whose "parody" label is omitted in the image.

title: Desinformaciones impulsadas por nominados a gabinete de Trump | Hechos
shortDescription: Otros de los nominados por Trump han mostrado escepticismo respecto a temas de cambio climático que ya tienen consenso científico.

title: No, Trump didn't name Hulk Hogan as education secretary | Fact check
shortDescription: There was no evidence to support the claim, which was made by a comedian, when it was made. Trump later picked an Oregon lawmaker for the job.

title: Claim Trump appointed Karl Malone started as satire | Fact check
shortDescription: The claim originated from a satirical account. Trump can't appoint a new director for Child Protective Services because it is a state-run agency.

title: Trump nominates businessman John Phelan to be Secretary of the Navy
shortDescription: Phelan, a Trump campaign donor, has never served in the military.

title: What is swatting? What to know after threats made to Trump's nominees
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet nominees received swatting threats, a prank that has become more common since the late 2000s.

title: Parody account spread fabricated Trump quote on Ukraine | Fact check
shortDescription: There's no credible evidence Trump, as president-elect, said he would "make sure" Biden doesn't let Ukraine use U.S.-supplied missiles against Russia.

title: After talk of ending Ukraine war 'in a day,' Trump names peace envoy
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump and some of his appointees have expressed skepticism about sending Ukraine additional military aid.

title: Man arrested after allegedly threatening to kill Trump in Facebook videos
shortDescription: Manuel Tamayo-Torres posted multiple videos threatening to kill the president-elect, according to court documents.

title: These products could be hit hard by Trump tariffs
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump pitched a 25% tariff on goods from Mexico and Canada, two of Arizona's major import partners.

title: Several Trump Cabinet nominees targeted with 'violent' threats, FBI says
shortDescription: The Trump transition team said the attacks included bomb threats and 'swatting' against several of President-elect Trump's Cabinet nominees.

title: Trump team takes credit for Biden's Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire deal
shortDescription: The Biden administration reportedly briefed Trump's team about the deal, which has been in the works for months.

title: As Trump names trade chief, fear mounts for Mexican firms
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Trump tapped trade lawyer Jamieson Greer as his new trade representative. It comes a day after Trump's threats of hefty tariffs on Canada, Mexico, and China.

title: This is the one district in Manhattan that Donald Trump won
shortDescription: Welcome to the home of Donald Trump's only electoral win in Manhattan. This giant apartment complex in New York's Lower East Side is called Knickerbocker Village.

title: Federal judge dismisses Jan. 6 case against Trump | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Lawyers for Donald Trump have conducted a probe of an aide who asked prospective political appointees for payments to promote their interests.

title: Biden proposes Medicare, Medicaid cover pricey weight-loss drugs for obese Americans
shortDescription: Millions of Americans could soon have access to weight-loss medications that some have called "miracle drugs."

title: Trump's phone calls with world leaders raise security alarms
shortDescription: The State Department has been shut out of Donald Trump's calls with world leaders, raising concerns about confusion over U.S. foreign policy.

title: Trump nominates Jamieson Greer as US trade representative
shortDescription: Jamieson Greer, Trump's pick for US trade representative, will play a pivotal role as Trump carries out tariffs hikes on Mexico, Canada and China.

title: Trump picks Jay Bhattacharya, COVID lockdown critic, as NIH director
shortDescription: Jay Bhattacharya, Trump's pick to lead the NIH, is known for arguing against lockdowns and for "herd immunity" to control the COVID-19 virus.
